content.p: The School of Environmental and Geographical Sciences delivers the BSc Environmental Science degree. This degree is awarded at the Malaysia Campus and is the same as conferred in the UK. Please visit the programme page to learn more about course structure, content and entry requirements. UNMC also offers Pre-sessional English courses as well as The Learning Center and In-sessional programmes for enrolled students across the university who need some extra language assistance. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
